title: Wanted: A Good Woman
description: After years of abuse at the hands of her husband, Julie Harris finally escapes with her daughters and finds sanctuary with her father. But when a mysterious heart attack kills the elder Harris, Julie is back on the run. Desperate to leave her husband far behind, Julie takes the unusual offer to relocate to a rural town in Wyoming. With her cowboy guide, handsome rancher Wil Stoddard, she vanishes off the map. Settling over a thousand miles away, the young mother tried to build a life for her small family. As romantic passions simmer close to boiling, Julie struggles with the terror of her past. With her husband getting closer every day, she cannot help but be drawn to Wil. Written with a rustic flavor and rich in authenticity, Wanted is a character driven novel that submerges you in a rich new world.
author: Jane B. Celaya
